Controllers

Class OfflinePatientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.OfflinePatientController

  • public class OfflinePatientController
extends java.lang.Object
    OfflinePatientController Can get patient object from userId Offline Can add patient object to database Offline Can delete patient object to database Offline Can modify patient object to database Offline
